document.full_text: nigeria postponed parliamentary elections until monday after voting materials failed to arrive in many areas, a major blow to hopes of a break with a history of chaotic polls in africa's most populous nation.
document.title: nigerian vote aborted after ballot paper chaos
lines_and_colors: nigeria postponed parliamentary elections until monday after voting materials failed to arrive in many areas, a major blow to hopes of a break with a history of chaotic polls in africa's most populous nation.
